title: A Memoir of the Bunurongs
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Memory
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Cities and towns
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Victoria - Description and travel
abstract: The essence of Sorrento - the oldest settled town in Victoria
description: A brief memoir recording the sights, sounds and essence of Sorrento, a small seaside town nestled in between Portsea and Blairgowrie on the Mornington Peninsula. Evocative images are accompanied by a music soundtrack and text (in English).
related_objects: Collection; B1003241; Memory Grid MAP Project Collection; Active; 2002
